price: Lalle Allah ne Masanin gaibin sammai da ƙasã. Lalle Shĩ ne Masani ga abin da yake ainihin zukata.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَٰلِمُ غَيۡبِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha ʿālimu ghaybi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi innahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
